name: Treasure Miner 2 - 2d Gem Mine
description:
Treasure Miner 2 - Discover the sequel to the successful Treasure Miner. Build your own mine infastructure and be the first miner, who discover rare artefacts, ores and gems. Invest your money in new technologies and expand your mine with new buildings, more lifts or better equipment.

Game features:
-discover 2 rare ores and minerals ( silver, gold, emerald , uranium , diamond ... )
-discover rare artefacts
-build up your mine with different buildings
- Fight against spiders and dwarfs
- randomed and deep maps
- Easy controll
- Invest in companies ( New technologies )

So what are you waiting for? Take your pick and dig as deep as you can into the mine. Be the best miner on earth!

Please help us by rating the game, sending us your suggestions on how we can
improve this game or just follow us on facebook, twitter or youtube.
